summary: Build 'Class 9 Epic Adventure' interactive web app with a dark-mode neon (Roblox x Minecraft-inspired) aesthetic featuring a central World Map with 3 realms (Science, Maths, SST), chapter-based unlockable levels, boss-fight quizzes, and XP/coins/streak gamification UI.
architectural_notes: Dark-mode neon UI; Roblox x Minecraft-inspired visual style.
Central World Map as primary information architecture with 3 realms and sub-areas.
Chapter content represented as unlockable levels with 3D-styled icons.
Use compact, icon-forward 'Power Cards' instead of long text; emphasize animations.
Gamification loop includes XP/Coins/Medals plus visible level progress and daily streak.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Central world map background in a dark neon voxel style with three distinct realm landmarks (world-map-hub.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Three realm emblem icons in a consistent 3D neon voxel style: Quantum Galaxy, Infinity Dungeon, Civilization Quest (realm-emblems-set.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Science planet icon set (Chemistry, Physics, Biology) in 3D neon voxel style (science-planets-icons.dim_1024x1024.png)
- SST kingdom icon set (History, Geography, Civics/Pol Science, Economics) in 3D neon voxel style (sst-kingdom-icons.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Pack of chapter level 3D icons (generic but varied) in neon voxel style (chapter-level-icons-pack.dim_2048x2048.png)
- Chapter Mastery Medal icon in neon voxel style (chapter-mastery-medal.dim_512x512.png)
- Coins icon in neon voxel style (coins-icon.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Update the landing experience to match the requested theme and CTA: dark-mode neon (Roblox x Minecraft-inspired) aesthetic and a giant pulsing main button labeled exactly "START YOUR QUEST".

Add a central "World Map" navigation hub screen that presents exactly three Massive Realms and becomes the primary navigation entry point: (1) THE QUANTUM GALAXY (Science), (2) THE INFINITY DUNGEON (Mathematics), (3) THE CIVILIZATION QUEST (SST).

Implement THE QUANTUM GALAXY (Science realm) structure on the frontend with 3 planets—Chemistry, Physics, Biology—and represent each requested chapter as an unlockable Mission Level with a distinct 3D icon.
Implement THE INFINITY DUNGEON (Mathematics realm) as a linear path of Boss Levels covering every listed chapter, with clear progression and locking until prior levels are completed.

Implement THE CIVILIZATION QUEST (SST realm) with 4 distinct Kingdoms—History Portal, Geography Portal, Civics/Pol Science Fortress, Economics Valley—and represent each listed chapter within its kingdom as an unlockable level node with a 3D icon.

Update the Boss Fight experience so every chapter quiz is a "Boss Fight" tied to a specific chapter node (not just a subject-wide quiz list), with minimal text and an icon-forward "Power Card" presentation.

Implement the requested reward rules end-to-end: winning a chapter Boss Fight awards exactly 500 XP, 50 Coins, and a "Chapter Mastery Medal" recorded for that specific chapter (and used to unlock subsequent levels).
Update the top HUD to include: a glowing level-up progress bar, a Daily Streak fire icon, and a visible Coins counter, and ensure it stays consistent across realm maps and boss fights.
Apply the requested subject color system consistently across the World Map, realm UIs, nodes, and Boss Fight screens: Science = neon green, Maths = neon gold, SST = neon red.

Add a chapter/realm content model on the frontend that enumerates all chapters exactly as specified (Science planets/chapters, Maths linear chapters, SST kingdoms/chapters) and use it to drive the World Map and Boss Fight routing.
Render generated image assets from the static public assets directory (frontend/public/assets/generated) for the World Map and key realm visuals, without routing images through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Landing page with pulsing main CTA button 'START YOUR QUEST'
Central 'World Map' navigation hub with 3 Massive Realms: Quantum Galaxy (Science), Infinity Dungeon (Maths), Civilization Quest (SST)
Science realm (Quantum Galaxy): 3 planets (Chemistry/Physics/Biology) with chapters as unlockable mission levels and 3D icons
Maths realm (Infinity Dungeon): linear path of boss levels covering all listed chapters
SST realm (Civilization Quest): 4 kingdoms (History/Geography/Civics-Electoral-PolSci/Economics) with the listed chapters
Gamification: chapter quizzes as 'Boss Fights' awarding 500 XP, 50 Coins, and a 'Chapter Mastery Medal' on win
Player HUD: top-header level-up progress bar and daily streak indicator
UI component system using icon-based animated 'Power Cards' (avoid long text)
Neon color theme mapping: Science neon green, Maths neon gold, SST neon red (dark-mode neon aesthetic)

Extend the backend gamification model to include coins and chapter mastery tracking (per user, per chapter), and add backend methods needed by the frontend to: fetch a user’s coins + mastery/unlock state, and mark a chapter boss fight as completed with the fixed rewards.
